channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Hit List
channel.desc: It's another star-studded celebrity special of The Hit List. The three teams joining Marvin and Rochelle Humes are Loose Women K?ll? Bryan and Brenda Edwards, actor Layton Williams and presenter Angela Scanlon, and former rugby player James Haskell and presenter Mike Bushell. Who will hit the right note and get the chance to win ?10,000 for their chosen charity?
